elisp_config:
;; Emacs LSP configuration for Prolog
(use-package lsp-mode
  :hook (prolog-mode . lsp)
  :commands lsp
  :config
  (lsp-register-client
   (make-lsp-client
    :new-connection (lsp-stdio-connection '("node" "./out/pub/features/prologLSPServer.js" "--stdio"))
    :major-modes '(prolog-mode)
    :server-id 'prolog-lsp
    :root-uri (lsp-workspace-root)
    :initialization-options '((enableSnippets . t)
                             (enableFormatting . t)
                             (enableDiagnostics . t)))))

;; Prolog mode setup
(use-package prolog
  :mode (("\\.pl\\'" . prolog-mode)
         ("\\.pro\\'" . prolog-mode)
         ("\\.prolog\\'" . prolog-mode)
         ("\\.plt\\'" . prolog-mode)
         ("\\.ecl\\'" . prolog-mode))
  :config
  (setq prolog-system 'swi))

;; LSP UI enhancements
(use-package lsp-ui
  :commands lsp-ui-mode
  :config
  (setq lsp-ui-doc-enable t
        lsp-ui-doc-position 'at-point
        lsp-ui-sideline-enable t
        lsp-ui-sideline-show-hover t))

;; Company completion
(use-package company-lsp
  :commands company-lsp
  :config
  (push 'company-lsp company-backends))
